name: PDS1 - Projecting HSR Travel based on announced Track building plans
description: Taking the announcements of HSR track projects, and estimated completion date, we use a regionally- appropriate travel density estimation to determine how much travel will occur on built tracks. We include a 1% annual growth in this travel density and interpolate the adoption over study period.

name: PDS2 - Projecting HSR Travel based on announced Track building plans
description: Taking the announcements of HSR track projects, and estimated completion date, we use a regionally- appropriate travel density estimation to determine how much travel will occur on built tracks. We include a 2.5% annual growth in this travel density and interpolate the adoption over study period.

name: PDS3 - Projecting HSR Travel based on announced Track building plans
description: Taking the announcements of HSR track projects, and estimated completion date, we use a regionally- appropriate travel density estimation to determine how much travel will occur on built tracks. We use the maximum travel density found worldwide as the theoretical maximum usage.
